data.system_settings: Windows 10 Professional x64 - Fall Creators Update.
data.actual_result: You get an error message, saying that either the application isn't running or there was no new account, even though the feature is working correctly.
data.expected_result: You should see the connection section without any error messages, even though it is working.
data.short_description: Even though you are given the options to connect the selected account through Connections, it still displays the error saying that either the application is not running, or no new accounts was detected.
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure that you have friends on any platform that you are connecting to who isn't your friend on Discord, like LoL and the application is running. - Go to Users Settings - Go to Connections - Click on the said application / platform's icon, like LoL's. - You do not need to connect, but close it after doing on so. - Observe.
